text: The provisions of this chapter do not reduce, replace, or eliminate:

sections.text: The duties and obligations of a property owner to monitor, repair, or maintain the property as required under any applicable District law or regulation; or
The authority of the Mayor to enforce applicable housing codes or to issue orders in accordance with any applicable District law or regulation.

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)
